element.name: The Book of Fantasia Campaign Guide 2024

p.strong: House rules for DM RJBPrime's Campaign

description.p: The Book of Fantasia is the campaign guide for DM RJBPrime's players. It contains rules for character creation, custom content, and much more. Use this book, in conjunction with other D&D 5th edition sources, to create exciting characters from among the most iconic D&D races and classes.

Dungeons & Dragons immerses you in a world of adventure. Explore ancient ruins and deadly dungeons. Battle monsters while searching for legendary treasures. Gain experience and power as you trek across uncharted lands with your companions.
The world needs heroes. Will you answer the call?
